## hpr2268 :: Fish On!

 Whether hitting your local lake or planning a day trip out, it is always good to consult tech that can help out making the trip as successful as possible. Here are the items mentioned in the podcast:

Google Weather
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.macropinch.swan&hl=en
Google Maps
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.apps.maps&hl=en
Sea Tow
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.seatow.assistant&hl=en
Fish Brain
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fishbrain.app&hl=en
Fishing Times (Free)
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fishingtimesfree&hl=en
Sufix Guide
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rapala.sufixfishinglineguide
GoFree Hooked (Free)
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.navico.gofreehooked
Insight Genesis
https://gofreemarine.com/insight-genesis/
Navionics Boating HD
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=it.navionics.singleAppMarineLakesHD
Fishpoints
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gregacucnik.fishingpoints



YT Video subs

Leo Schen
Extreme Philly Fishing
https://www.youtube.com/user/extremephillyfishing?feature=em-lss
William B. tedrick
Fishtales
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCI8h7DBJRSEZgxsUy8_0a8w
Haru834
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvh_ijYeUoNwejWhPNvD-RQ
